name: Victer Glass
text: Rent is changed without notice also they charge multiple late fees.

resp.text: We send out a postcard in advance of any rental modification. We also check pricing weekly to insure we're giving the best value (for what we provide). Please give the manager a call if you need more information or ask for Steve/Regional Mgr. We love our clients and want to be here to support them in their storage needs.

name: Melva Johnson
text: The staff was helpful and informative, the storage unit clean. I needed it for relocation from out of state and it was simple and the forms were emailed to me so I could reserve the unit. Very simple and everything went through in a timely manner.

name: Christine Currie
text: The manager took the time to show me 2 different size units that would work for everything I was storing. The managers keeps the place very CLEAN and I like that there is a gate, cameras, and lights at night. I KNOW my items are safe here and the PRICE was the BEST I could find !!

name: Perry Buchanan
text: Love the staff. Easy access and 24 hour availability to your units. Much better than the others in town.

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity to serve you!

name: Kirsten Store
text: Great and friendly and the manager went above the call of duty to help us with our situation.     I would recommend them to everyone.   Excellent customer service, 24 hour security and they are clean.    I feel safe being out in unit at all hours.

name: Benton Lindsey
text: Gate in front stays broken, anyone can just go in when it's broken in the open position.

resp.text: Gate has been repaired.  We had a lightning strike which destroyed the "computer connection." All has been repaired and is working properly.  All clients have their own personal gate code.  Thank you for your concern/feedback.  Steve/Regional Manager

name: Buttetfly Freedom Forever
text: If you need a storage unit, this is the place to go. Friendly employees, very secure for your personal belongings. Reasonable prices.

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity to serve you!

text: Lady at the front counter had social hour while helping me and waited a whole hour before telling me they don't accept cash. This place isn't worth the headache.

resp.text: We stopped accepting cash a few years ago (sign in office). However, we do accept checks, money orders, credit cards (onsite) and online payments.

I hope her boss realizes what an awesome employee she is and rewards her accordingly. Having been a business owner myaelf, I realize how difficult great employees are to come by. I will definitely recommend this business to others.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback, and we apologize about the confutation. We do have RV storage at our Odom Crossing location and Ross Clark Circle East location in Dothan as listed on our website. If you are still looking for a place to store your RV, we would be happy to help you with this. Please visit our website at http://www.storestuffhere.com/ to find the best location for your needs and the best number to reach us at.

Mrs. Sonja,

Anonymous  Customer =)

name: Forever Young
text: This location (Oxmoor Rd., Birmingham, AL) does NOT perform any pest control! The property is full of spiders. One or two spiders is expected for an outside unit BUT 10+ spiders inside unit is unacceptable for a unit I've only had a couple of months. That shows lack of pest control or even Raid! I have spoken with several employees, multiple times, at this location about pest issue and requested for their DM  (Nathan) to call me which as yet to happen even though they noted in my file several times for him to call me. I've been complaining for weeks. They have also decided to increase the storage rental an extra $22 ( I've only had the unit 6 months and according to the fine print, they can increase every 6 months if they choose to). Employees have openly complained to me about management and company and how they hate working for Public Storage (I have the recordings). Unethical and poor company values. If i was not out of state on a job assignment, i would've moved my property months ago! The ONE star is for the employees who work onsite because they all were helpful even though they have no control or say over any issue. And I wonder if they are offered the people below me some type of incentive for a "5 star" review?!? More than likely. Save yourself and your property the stress/insects, and CHOOSE ANOTHER STORAGE COMPANY! ~~~Update~~~ Nathan, DM, finally decided to call me. Ironically. He informed me that they have Orkin pest control which comes monthly and that maybe the location of my unit is why I have a MAJOR spider issue. He refused to provide me w/ a date of last service from Orkin. According to him, it would be too much of an hassle to go through the paperwork to find invoice. Really?!? His advice is that i consider moving allllll my property to a different unit which isn't near trees. Really?!?! Sooooo, after some prompt investigation and people I know, I have a invoice showing where Orkin last serviced the property in Sept. 2015 and this review was written on July 2016.... ALMOST A YEAR AGO SINCE THEY HAD ANY PEST CONTROL SERVICE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Go figure, huh?

name: Staci Shelton
text:
I have been with IStorage for about 2 years now. My grandson graduated high school and was offered a full scholarship at Auburn University. As an average family we made the decision to rent my home and I would move in with my daughter and assist with getting him through college. So I packed up my most precious belongings and searched for a climate controlled unit for myself. The staff were most helpful and assisted me in getting an end unit so that I could get to my things easily if needed. Being a single woman and trusting your entire life being put into storage can be so stressful. However Ashley has been great, her kind words and helpful attitude have made me feel comfortable about leaving my life of independence and helping to write a new chapter in life for my grandson. I certainly hope that IStorage knows what a wonderful employee they have in Ashley. I would not hesitate to recommend this facility to anyone for their storage needs. I still have 2 more years to go before I can once again be independent and I can do that with no worries
Thank you so much Ashley !!!!

name: Mik S
text:
the office staff is great.    They are super nice, helpful and friendly.  Nothing but good things to say about them.
but you can tell "corporate america" has taken over.   I've never had to fill out so many forms in my life to rent a storage building.  They wanted my car insurance, car registration, home owners insurance, etc to store items (car and household items).    .     Prices are also high. $25 paperwork fee. (or whatever you call it) and   $120 a month for a 10x20.

I just called and "covered storage" for my boat is $137/month.    I can keep it in the local "dry storage" Marina where it's kept inside protected from freezing and put in the water any time I want for $130 per month, with full service.   You call their local phone number and it also goes to a corporate 800 number call desk. This place was a LOT cheaper before it became an "iStorage" franchise. (used to be "The Storage Place).

Overall it was a good experience and the office staff was great, and unit was cleane.  I just thought it was high prices and too much paperwork.

resp.text: Hi Mik, My name is Judy. Thanks for sharing how nice and helpful the staff was to you, we appreciate those kind words. Please contact the facility and they will help your resolve this issue. Thank you.

name: Chris Overall
text: Priced to High

resp.text: We value all our customers and work hard to keep our prices competitive and fair. Unfortunately, operating cost such as property taxes, insurance, maintenance, utilities, overhead, etc. are not stable and increase year over year.  For us to maintain excellent service levels we must pass along a portion of those increases to our customers.  In addition, unlike several of our competitors who raise rents every couple of months, we process increases annually.  We are continuing to make improvements throughout the facility including asphalt, paint and building repairs to ensure that your experience at iStorage is the best possible. We look forward to serving you in the future. If there is anything more we can do to improve your experience please email us at info@istorage.com or give us a call toll free at 844-311-2342. Best Regards, the iStorage Team.

text: BMI storage was a great place for me to store my furniture. The facility is the cleanest place I have ever seen. I liked the security features in place. They also had hand trucks to assist me in getting my items from my car to the unit. I liked the two doors on both ends of my large unit as well as the light that came on when I opened the door. My experience with BMI was pleasurable. I highly recommend them for your storage needs.

name: gwsmith46541
text: We stored our belongings for a year and a half as we traveled the country in our motorhome.  This is an excellent facility!   I don’t think we could have found a better one.  Judith, the office manager, was always very helpful.

text: We have used BMI storage for the past five+ years and have been extremely pleased.  The facility is very clean and well-kept and we have had absolutely no problems.  Have always felt that our storage items were secure and safe.    The staff is friendly and easy to work with.  Really a good experience and would recommend to others with no reservations at all!

name: Jessika Harris
text: Have been doing business with them for over 3 years & they have always been top notch with everything! I feel VERY safe with the level of security measures taken here to keep belongings secure! Other storage facilities may be cheaper, but you pay for what you get.

name: Fred Pich
text: We have had our motorcoach stored in one of the large 50 foot units for the past four years. I could not have been happier with BMI storage.  The grounds are always kept immaculate and the management is always very pleasant and responsive to deal with. Highly recommend!

text: BMI has an exceptional clean and well maintained facility!  They went over and beyond to be sure that I was happy. I was not only impressed with the cleanliness of the facility, but the level of security is outstanding, as well.

text: We have had a unit there for over 5 and a half years and it has been the BEST experience. And, the staff is so incredibly friendly; they all will be missed!

text: Used it for 18 months, and it was always well maintained and secure. The management are understanding and do their best to meet your scheduling needs. I highly recommend this location as the best in Dothan and would use it again in the future.

text: BMI Storage is an excellent storage company! It's clean, well maintained, easy to get to and has great hours. The staff is so friendly and always knows me when I call in to pay my monthly fee over the phone. Very sweet and helpful! I would 100% recommend this storage facility!

It wasn't until I emptied the unit and took inventory of my things that I discovered that I had items missing. Very displeased with the new management. I never had any issues until new management took over.

text: Brandon does good work if you need repairs, and its a great place to store your RV.

name: Michael Jernigan
text:
The way this establishment treated my brother and his family because he was an African American, I wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone!!! The service was awful, they kept his RV over 8 months and didn’t fix anything on the RV.

My Caucasian friends recommended this place to me because of all the things they had them fix on their RV. My brother bought his RV here to have the same small issues fixed and he was told after 8 months that they don’t fix any of those things on RV’s anymore! Unbelievable...

name: Nicholas Milner
text:
To put it as professionally and simple as I can the customer service is really bad! We weren’t reinventing the wheel nor were we solving the problems in Washington.We were simply installing a new awning and the parts never arrived over a period of six weeks.
After an extended period I called and inquired with no return call, I went by and expressed my desire to know a date to expect my repair to be completed and Brandon vowed to have me answers on the following Monday. This day come and went with no communication as well. I waited until today (Thursday) to call and there were still no answers to my question.Brandon called me 3 hours later and informed me the supplier wasn’t sure if it was shipped, going to ship or might ship!
At this time I expressed my irritation and asked Brandon if this was a job he really wanted to do or did I need to find another repair shop..His words were “ I can’t seem to satisfy you so just come get it”.. so I did and I hope whom ever reads this thinks twice before letting your unit sit and sit and sit.

name: Carol P
text: Excellent deal for $40 a month. I would give this a five star rating when the rest of the gravel is put in. Ask about their separately priced setup options, too. How wonderful it is to have someone bring your camper to where you want it, and then have it set up for you when you arrive.

name: Josh King
text: Excellent and friendly service, and these are good honest business people.  Even though they aren't the closest RV place to me, I will always take my business to them since they are such a good business.

name: Jon Marshall
text: Rarely do you find exceptional customer service like you do here.  I stored my camper and 5 X 9 trailer here for a year and cannot be happier with the friendly, professional service I've received.  With a simple phone call they've gladly handled every request from packing my bearings to filling my propane tanks.  Brandon, Mark, and the rest of the team are terrific.

name: Dean Beery
text: Took the trailer in for warranty work on a refrigerator that had quit working.  They were the quickest to take us in, in the area.  Great service, went the extra mile with us.  The Norcold refrigerator had a part that was new to their line and hadn't put out a bulletin for it.  The service department helped with contact with Norcold and helped set up the delivery of the part to the next area we are traveling to and also got the refrigerator working on propane.  Spent all morning with us.  No charge to us.

name: Kevin Long
text: Very Knowledgeable staff and they do great work!!!

name: Daniel Webster
text: I moved in to my unit today. After setting up with another place and moving 2500 miles to here I was told the unit was no longer available from a different place. With a quick google search I found trimax. Made a phone call and an hour later I was set. The two ladies in the office were very pleasant to work with and gave a sense of security for me. I know my stuff is protected here. The price is extremely fair for the size of units and the fact that they have lights and power. The driveways are plenty large enough to bring big vehicles in which was another issue I was having at other locations. I was able to bring my 40 foot race trailer in with ease and unload it. Traffic was low in and out of the facility. The grounds are kept very clean and you can tell that every one working there takes pride in what they serve the public. Thanks you Trimax!!

name: Jeffery Runyon
text: DO NOT store anything here! Security is very lacking and customer service is worse!! I notice my boat parked there had several hundreds of dollars of stuff stolen from it. I called the office to notify them and to see if video was taken and they told me they would have to check and get back to me. We’ll no call back after a week so I called them. When speaking to the gentleman he said yeah we have footage of two people stealing stuff but he assumed someone else called me back to notify me. At this point he gave no other information I had to ask him, well how did they get into the secure facility, have they been identified, has the facility been secured. As a customer paying good money to store property there I would expect them to be proactive in noticing a forced entry to the facility but they were not. Please do not store you property if you want to keep your property.

resp.text: Jeffery Runyon, thank you for your feedback. We sincerely appreciate your business and want to apologize that you had a negative experience. We will continue to work with you to resolve the situation. We encourage you to stay in contact with us so that we can do everything possible help.  Thank you, Compass Self Storage

name: Jelisa Williams
text: Let me start by saying Jarvis was an outstanding customer service representative! However, my experience with public storage has been far from pleasant. 2 months after moving into my unit I went by to check on my furniture (2 bedroom sets and a living room set) and was horrified when I was greeted by a dead rat at the front of my storage unit. The explanation given by the customer service representative Nyrie was, "We try to tell people not to leave food in their unit. It probably came from another unit." Today I went in to close out my account and was told that although I was closing my account out today December 5, 2017 I would be charged until the end of the month. Originally I was told that the amount would be prorated however was later told that they no longer prorate because their competitors do not prorate. I followed up with the district manager Jennifer Sanders and was told that unless I kept my personal lock on the unit they would rent the unit out to someone else although I was charged for the remainder of december, which I must say I find inappropriate. She then proceeded to hang the phone up. Next time I will keep my business with grand slam storage. CHEAPER ISN'T ALWAYS BETTER!  YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR!

name: Hannah Craft
text: I was trying to figure out the logistics with my truck/tow rental, and the Uhaul call center was not very helpful and often had a 20-39 minute wait. I went in and talked to Anthonio, the General Manager, and he got everything figured out! He was very professional and helpful.

name: Shan Key
text: Worst customer service I have ever seen anywhere.  Had a scheduled appointment with them to install a hitch at 9:00. This was the first available spot two weeks ago. Did arrive 30 min late. Girl at counter was nice and said it would be ready in approximately 1.5 hours. Left it for 2.5 hours and came back. Car has not been touched. I drove an hour to get there and an hour home. Wrecked half a day. Asked for a full refund. Asked for the manger and he yelled at me, saying “we call you when ready”. I asked was it complete and he yelled “does it have a hitch on it?”  He didn’t know or care and walked outside to see. I asked for the contact info of his manager. I called him and all he said was we let you down and I will talk to manager. They should have put the car on the rack, and knocked it out and offered some sort of discount. I leave on vacation tomorrow so no hitch, no trailering. I wouldn’t spend a dime here ever again, and it’s no wonder there rating is so low here and on y e l p.

name: Brandon Jones
text: Don't waste your time dealing with the people at this location.  They know nothing about the products and will sell you one product, but try to install another. This is because they have no idea what they are doing.  I'm surprised they can figure out how to unlock to doors to open in the morning.  Don't waste your time.  If negative stars were an option, that's the rating I would give this location.

name: Casey Hensley
text: Not helpfulful at all. Waste of time.

text: Had rented a trailer for my move, and they helped me attach it to my car and showed me how to attach it myself should I need to detach and then reattach. Was in and out in less than 20 minutes!

name: Nina Coats
text: Great

name: Elizabeth Fauss
text: We highly recommend this campground! It’s a wonderful very safe place to stop and camp especially if you are doing just one night! It’s quiet and very easy to get to from I-20. It is exactly 1 mile (doesn’t even feel like it’s even that far). It’s behind the storage company. If you don’t turn right on the road after the storage place you will miss it. It’s a tucked away treasure. The spaces are huge, easy to get in and out of and perfectly flat! There is a beautiful tree line and plenty of areas for your pups. Bruce the owner is amazing! He has made the process so simple and easy to book. He is very friendly and down to earth. I cannot praise this place enough!

name: Kathy McCorkle
text: Hidden Gem!  Right off I 20.  Not a resort, it’s well kept, large gravel sites for one night or long term, easy hookups, grass and not one or two, but three, large fenced in, grass dog runs!  Well kept, owner was very helpful, we will definitely back on next cross country trip.  Had a 40ft Class A towing and did not have to unhook.  Wish they could all be this big, neat, easy in and out!  See you next time!

resp.text: We we be here ready for you! So glad you enjoyed your stay!

name: L Spo
text: Traveling back home from Tennessee to Texas.  We found this little gem looking for an overnight stop.  It is exactly as it describes. If you are traveling and need a clean,safe place this is it.  Water, sewer,electric (30/50 amp), WiFi, two dog runs and one mile off interstate 20 .  Easy off/on.  Easy in/out.  Large well packed base slots with many pull thru.  Bruce is a great host.  We will be back for sure next trip thru.

resp.text: We'd love to have you back! Safe travels!

name: Julia Slaughter
text: Clean, safe park. Owner was very accommodating and a pleasure to speak with on the phone. He was very very very very helpful. Facilities were perfect and it was quiet. Not too crowded. We got in at 11ish, and it was no problem! Definitely recommend

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We are so glad you had a great experience! We love to hear this and feel free to come back any time you're in the area!

name: Donna Pickett
text: This place is a great place to stay! Nice people and clean/quiet area despite being close to businesses. They also have a safe area to go to in case of bad weather which made me feel safe   I’m a travel nurse being alone most of the time and I felt secure here. Not far off interstate and close to college and anything you might need. Thanks Bama!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. We strive to provide the best experience for our patrons.

name: Mark Bosch
text: If you’re looking for a peaceful, well kept park, this is a the ticket! Multiple dog park areas, quiet and away from the main road, and the owner seems to care about every customer. If you’re looking for an overnight stay, football game stay, or extended stay, you can’t go wrong here.

name: Judy Herring
text: We rented a large pull-thru capable of handling a 75ft rig for a night while passing thru. We had adequate room for turning and maneuvering a large rig. Level, gravel site with 50 amps, water and sewer. Lots of choices for food delivery with Waitr was a plus!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review. Glad you found some great food while you were here too!

name: keith walter
text: Great overnight stay in a 40 ft Class A towing a Jeep with bikes. Big-rig friendly. Level easy in easy out sites.Can't be be beat for an ovefnight stay. We ard Lifetime Good Samm Members and absolutely recommdnd this Park to all RV'ers.

resp.text: Thank you for taking time to leave your feedback. We are glad you had such a positive experience at Bama RV Station!

name: Keith n Marie Kosmin
text: Clean, quiet, friendly and well maintained RV park. Great location during football season, but we stayed there overnight while on our way to Texas. Owner is very friendly and helpful. Location is far enough away from the interstate that you don’t hear trucks and other loud vehicles, but it is close enough to be a convenient overnight stop. We will definitely stay here again.

resp.text: We would love to have you back! Our facility is in a great location and we love it! So glad you enjoyed it. This is what we love to hear!

name: Tristan Schade
text: Fantastic campground! Will be coming back. Great staff! Bruce is a very friendly and helpful man.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Bruce cares about all of his patrons. I am glad you had a great experience with us.

name: Kendell Snyder
text: Stayed overnight on the way home from Florida, great park! Bruce was great, got us parked quickly. Park was clean and quiet, easy on/off from the interstate. Definitely stay here again!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Bruce is a great guy and we are blessed to have him as our owner.

name: Eileen Fox-Biswell
text: Very attentive owner. Very quiet location. Close to University of Alabama.

resp.text: It was a pleasure having you here with us. Come back any time!!!

name: Estefan Olivares
text:
Quiet place to park the rv. There are a lot of spots, and it was only partially filled during our visit. We were lucky to get a pull through spot at the end. Also lucky enough to be next to the two dog runs.  Bit expensive, but we had full hook ups with electricity and waste right next to the rv so we can just let the hose and wires out.

Staff was great. Even offered us some help if the storm got worse. There was a terrible storm supposed to come in, but it just rained. Still the thought that counts.

Neighbors were also friendly, which is good cause there isnt anything to do here so having a chat while walking the dog or working outside was great

name: Ryan Davis
text: Fair prices and excellent service. Bruce is a great guy.

resp.text: Thank you Ryan! We appreciate your business!

name: Carleen Hyatt
text: Clean, quiet, reasonably priced, level sites and friendly people.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Our 19 acre complex makes for a relaxing location for sure. Please come stay with us any time!

name: Samantha Shaw
text:
Under no circumstances use this camp ground. The owner cut off our water as I was washing dishes and turned off our power. This was not a one time thing and it will damage your camper. We lost all the food in our freezer. He did not knock and would just
come and open the door to the camper and had to keep it locked when I was there. When my husband went to talk to him about it very calmly and ask him to not mess with our camper. The man threatened my husband and got in his personal space. He then ask us to leave after we had paid for a month, due to asking him to not mess with our camper.

The lady at the office was very nice and helpful and did everything in her power to be so kind. She is the only good thing about the campground.

resp.text: We apologize for any misunderstanding that may have occurred during your stay with us.

name: Tammy Moore
text: Stayed here for 4 months and would highly recommend! This is a great place to stay. The owner and employees are very helpful and friendly. The RV park is in a convenient location and is safe and clean. If you need a RV park in Tuscaloosa, this is the place to stay!!

resp.text: Thank you very much! We are happy we could meet your expectations. Come back any time!

name: Patty Boulos
text: clean spots and had a great time

resp.text: Thank you for staying with us! Come on back anytime you need a place to stay!

name: Mandy MW
text: Stayed here for our first trip with a 41ft camper. Online reservations were super easy, the park was well maintained and quiet, the dog parks were clean and had plenty of SHADE! Easy location to find and close to the interstate. Lots of restaurants available for delivery on the Waitr app, too! I’m guessing during football season it’s a bit more full, but we really enjoyed our few days here as a test run!

name: Melody Cook
text: My husband and I have stayed at Bama RV over the past three months. Contrary to a couple of previous reviews, Bama RV certainly does cater to long-term camping! We have a wonderful spot, and even though we have neighbors (which we like!), we have plenty of privacy. We have a dog, so we are very fond of the three different pet areas that are offered. We have full hook up and also Wi-Fi is included in the cost! Bama RV is conveniently located less than a mile from the interstate, and with a quick trip you can reach downtown and The University of Alabama area. It is also only about a 30 minute drive to Birmingham and less if you need to go to MBUSI in Vance. Last but certainly not least, you won’t find better customer service! Denise is the absolute best! From paying your bill, to asking random questions, she goes above and beyond to help in anyway possible! She even gave us a personal phone call when bad weather was approaching to make us aware of the shelter.  Even the owner, Mr. Bruce Taylor, makes the rounds occasionally to make sure everyone is happy and that all is well.  If I could give more than five stars I would!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We sure do take pride in our facility. Our owner, Bruce, makes sure everything is secure and pleasant for our patrons. Come stay with us anytime!!

name: Ed Baldwin
text: This RV park is perfect for our trip. We wanted to be close to the University of Alabama so we could attend our granddaughter soccer camp, and not have to drive 30 minutes or more to get there. We are less than 10 minutes from the campus. We have FHUs, great wifi signal, and adequate room. The only drawback is no restrooms, showers.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our location sets us apart in a lot of situations and we are so happy you could stay with us!

name: James Gest
text: Great place to stay for Alabama football season.  Owners are very friendly and helpful.

name: Steven Riley
text:
Very nice RV Park. The Lady at the front desk was as pleasant as they come. The park is gravel roads and sites. The sites are fairly large and the hookups are very convenient. Had no problem maneuvering my 42’ MH and full size pickup toad. There are train tracks at the back of the park. We never heard a horn the night we were there. I would certainly stay there again.
Steve Riley

name: Merle Baker
text: This was an easy place to get to but we were told they had pull throughs because that is what we had to have. Upon arrival we were told they do not have pull throughs. The lad on duty in the office was very nice and accommodating. She found a spot that was not being used that allowed us to pull though. We were just staying one night & did not want tonunhook our tie vehicle. So beware, if you need a pull though, don’t go here. Other than that it was fine.

name: Shawna Peterson
text: We stayed here four months. The people in the park are friendly. The staff is terrific. We would definitely stay here again. Thanks for everything Bama RV !

name: Jennifer Gresham
text: Staff is super helpful and friendly. Very convenient to the interstate, campus, and downtown. Nice amount of space for each rig and easy to get in and out of. Resident doggo Cooper is the best!!

name: Jon DeLuca
text: Very friendly staff, gravel road and sites, very easy to move my 41' fifth wheel in and out with ease. Good place to stay long term as well as tailgate! Roll Tide

name: Robert Slade
text: Stopped for one night in our motorhome.  Had a pull thru with 50A.  Nice clean park.  Very friendly at check-in.  Will stay here again.

name: Cindy Wilson
text: 4th year we've enjoyed a  AL football season.

name: LP
text: We love Bama RV Station!  Staff is super friendly and helpful.  Great place to store your RV if you need to.

name: Debbie Daniels
text: Nice place for one night.  Clean, good price.

name: J Thompson
text: We came down for a game last season.  It was a lot of fun.  The staff is very friendly and accomodating.

name: Justin Keeton
text: Very nice spot clean  lots i wasnt staying but a friend was if i had a camper id definitely  reccomend  this spot if you need somewhere  in the Tuscaloosa  area

name: Madison R
text: We really enjoyed our stay!  It was a perfect little home away from home.

Overhyped and overpriced. While the service is good they allow no long term rentals and they cater only to football fans . If you want a long term and more affordable RV park hit up sunset or Avalon .

Don't mean to be mean but if you're an rv park you should cater to anyone that is a patron. Not everyone lives and breathes beer and football.

name: Lindon Allen
text: Close to interstate, 50 amp service, southern hospitality, large camp spots, restaurants nearby, Walmart nearby, what more could you ask for?

name: Byrd Mathis
text: Clean grounds, level pads, several dog runs. Only drawback is no restrooms. Have stayed here in the past and would stay in the future.

name: Stephanie S.
text: This was a great RV park! We stayed here for 2 months and had a great experience. The people that run the RV park are very nice and helpful. It's a great location, it's located about a mile off the interstate and not far from gas stations, grocery stores etc. They also have GREAT Wi-Fi !! Which is very hard to find when staying at a RV park. I definitely recommend this RV park if your staying in the Tuscaloosa/Cottondale area.

name: Tom Kent
text: Nothing more than a parking lot with hookups. OK place for a couple of nights.

name: Robert Nelson
text: Good place to park the RV.

name: Llama D
text: Great customer service!

name: Lisa Reid
text: Good place to stay in Tuscaloosa

name: Phillip Powell
text: Do not believe the picture you see on the Google search because this place looked nothing like the picture.  When we first saw the location we were immediately concerned about security and it turned out we had a right to be concerned.  We moved in on a Saturday and the following Saturday we moved out because someone was obviously trying to break into our unit.  The only thing that saved the $10,000 worth of stuff we had in our unit was our lock.  The day we moved out I showed management the damage to our lock and I was told I would only have to pay for the week I was in the unit and "I will have a talk with my security person".  That turned out to be a lie when a month later I was told they would not refund me any money because "my stuff wasn't stolen".  Poor security( if there even is security provided) and for very poor customer service.  Please stay away from this site.

name: Christy Jameson
text: I recently vacated my space on August 2, 2020.  The previous day on the 1st I spoke to the manager on-site.  She was very nice and very customer service friendly.  I spoke about vacating my space so I wouldn’t be charged for another month.  It didn’t seem like a problem, she mentioned coming to get her when I was  finished, and I even made mention that I may not be done that day.  I was told no problem.  I came to the office on the 2nd at 10:00 am, let her know I was out, it swept clean and empty.  I then at that time asked if the auto-debit would still go through on my account as has been done religiously for 2 years, she said yes but that the pro-rates refund amount would be returned in approximately 5-7 days.  Today is a week and a half later, I tried to contact the site, spoke with an extremely rude customer service rep (NOT the on-site staff for clarification), and after with the District Manager Jordan. I was informed that I would not be receiving any money back as the rent is month to month and nothing would be done-however when I moved in I was pro-rated for days then? That it was policy....I fully understand that, I deal with policy every day-I am also have a responsibility to act fairly and not hide beyond policy and take care of my customers.  When I asked specifically (and while in the office ON THE 1st) when I would receive the difference back-that would have been the time to be upfront, transparent and honest about the truth about the intent to not refund the remaining days on my unit.  If I would have not been told a refund was coming I would have stayed the month-and not called regarding my pro-rated refund.  If that wasn’t what I was told why would I be calling? Bottom line here, I moved up the street to Extra Space Storage, rented the same size unit for $18/month.  I was paying Public Storage $89 after 3 increases over 6 mos.  for the same size unit.  At this day in age a simple apology for the miscommunication and an effort to reimburse me something would have been appreciated and seen as compromise, the lack of an attempt to make it right is unacceptable to me.  It’s not the $89 at this point it’s the principal of managing my expectations as a consumer.  Please go up the street to Extra Space Storage, who were very decent about not wanting to steal their customer by the way, business is business.  The pro-rated refund would have been easier at this point instead of a negative google review and friends that also rent there and now will know to relocate.  Hope it was worth it, I do plan to make further calls.  At this point I do want my money over the principal of standing up for myself and what is right.  By the way, I work for a large property management company in town and in 2 other states that I travel, we were using Public Storage on our marketing material for new move-ins to our apartments and giving them this location in just Birmingham.  That will be changing.  Hiding beyond policy is one thing, refusing to see your company miscommunicated and screwed up is another.

name: Tony Canterberry
text:
These folks are excessively rude & non-communicative. My wife and I own a retail business and needed extra space for sorting and storing inventory. For over 2 weeks, he told us he'd have a unit available.

He refuses to speak over the phone, rarely responded to our texts, and when he did respond, he was abrasive, short, and rude.

We reached out 4 different times on the days he told us it would be available, and each time he was progressively more condescending and rude.

The unit was supposed to be available Monday, and we moved several pallets worth of merchandise to be ready. Of course, the unit wasn't ready. When my wife contacted him today (Friday), he yelled at her, telling her a broken door spring was the reason he lied about the unit for over a week.

As a local Google guide and local business owner, I don't like leaving bad reviews for local businesses, but this place is just plain bad.

name: Lesia Bell
text: We had already set up to have a 10 foot , but when we got there to pick up  ,we were informed it was not available for the time we needed.  The lady was very rude. We would not recommend  to anyone.

resp.text: We are sorry about this Lesia. We are not Uhaul corporate only a dealer site that works off of truck rental commissions.  We are just an intermediary.  Uhaul corporate took our truck that was supposed to be rented to you from our place of business.  Unfortunately, that is sometimes out of our hands if Uhaul leaves us no equipment to rent.  We are asking for your forgiveness.  The truck was simply not available even though it showed in our system it was available.  We wish you the best.

text: I have stored with Huntsville Lock and storage for over a year. I can't tell you how accommodating and helpful their staff is! If you are considering a storage facility CHOOSE THIS LOCATION! text: A great place to store your stuff. Very helpful staff!

name: David King
text: I've been a long term tenant that pays annual rent in advance. Since Huntsville Lock Storage has taken over, my unit price has increased twice. Both increases came on my anniversary renewal date. The new owners have only been in place for 1 1/2 years. When I questioned the price increases I was told that it was an industry standard and due to operating expenses and improvements made to the property. Thanks for the second exit gate and the gravel drives with pot holes. One of the main reasons for moving to the previous Winchester Road Storage was that I was guaranteed a unit price that would never increase, as long as I was long term and paid in advance.  Randy was more about business relationships than the all mighty dollar. The new  owners would be wise to follow this principle.

name: Victor Burlingame
text: Glad to be out of our storage unit here. We were lured in with a move-in special that was never the price they promised. Then they promised a referral payment to the person that referred us that also never happened. we signed up several days early before needing the unit and told them we needed it ready by Sunday when we had planned on moving all our equipment in... well Sunday arrived, we had 4 guys and two trucks of equipment ready to be unloaded except they still had their company lock on our unit and wouldn't answer their phone, not even the emergency number. We had continued issues with billing and of course now that we informed them we had moved out, they said they couldn't do anything about the billing issues and hung up on us. Their excuse was the number of units they had made it confusing. ok, it's weird that you can't handle taking a payment that you have a contract stating once a month. I have pretty basic storage needs but wow, this place ended up being more trouble than it was worth and we pid more than we were supposed to every month. Just go to the place down the street to Smith Store-it, Ryland mini storage, or any of the dozen other places that can handle your business professionally

resp.text:
Effective this week, we are under new management.

Victor, we are sincerely sorry for the events that took place with your move-in and any other items.  With respect to your billing issues we are unaware of what issues you are referring too... simply put, your card did not process. I would love to discuss this with you further and see what can be done to make it up to you.  Our managers strive to take care of all of our customers.   Customer care and service is of most importance to us. We value all of our customers and always strive to offer the best service and response to our customers.   Please contact us and we are anxious to discuss further to alleviate any of your concerns.

Sincerely, Ownership

When it’s cold outside and I park my car and awaiting my ride she always invites me in the office to stay warm, and when it’s hot outside and I’m awaiting my ride from dropping of my car at the Storage facility she offers water. Southern hospitality at its finest!!

One occasion battery died in my vehicle when I went to pick it up, and guess who was the only one on the shift...Lawanda Wood. She went out of her way to help, even providing me with jumper cables and using her own personal car to jumpstart my car, and did it with a smile! Without her I would have had to call a tow truck! She really saved the day!

I’m not sure if anyone will read this but I had to write a review and hopefully she is recognized and rewarded for her continuous outstanding work and customer Service at the Martin road location. Thank you for always going above and beyond for your customers. That’s why I pick this location over more fancy places. People like Lawanada make it worth it. :-)

Sincerely,
Your happy customer

Theron Lewis.

name: Chad Wilson,
text:
The lady on site is very helpful( I apologize for not remembering her name).  I had to move to another unit due to the fact the door got jammed and off its track.  We both were unable to pop back into place.  She helped me by crawling under and helped remove my stuff by sliding under the door.  I lucked out was was able to transfer to another unit. Same size and price.  She went to make the transfer in the office and when she came back, offered to help some more and brought me a bottle of water.  It was very hot and we both were sweating.   By the time I finished up, it started raining.  Please show appreciation for your employee for going above and beyond
to make sure the customer is happy.

text: The best experience I have had when storing my valuables. The Store Manager, Brittany H. was extremely helpful when I setup my first storage unit. I even received a phone call to make sure that I was not late on a payment in order not to assess late charges. The facility is very clean and has been extremely safe. I would definitely recommend this to anyone needing short or long term storage.

text: Just price checking, seems like a nice place. The lady there was super nice and helpful. Will probably return to rent.

name: Dian Beaubien
text: Do not use this storage facility for Motorhome storage. I had my rv stored there 5 days.  In that short time, someone came in a cut my catalytic converter off causing me $1485 in damage.   They did say it was happening and was not the first.  But THEY are not responsible,  I’m filing a police report, but be very careful about your rv storage here.

name: Kevin Da King
text: Great place, great price, great customer service from both the guy and gal when I visit. John just broke down all the options I have for when I get my stuff out of storage this month and I didn’t even ask. Just volunteering the important extra information and going that extra mile for the customer. I highly recommend this place and the staff.

name: Deangelo Smith
text: The facility is well kept. Units are in great condition. The manager, Joel, was extremely helpful. Any question or concern I had, he had an immediate, reassuring response. This is my first time renting a storage unit and based off my experience I have nothing negative to say about this location or my experience. Two thumbs up!!

name: Eric Joyce
text: Unbelievably Great. Thank you John for fighting for the best deal for me. Thank you Brittany for your great service as well for my fourth unit. You both are great!!

name: Anne Hughes
text: Brittany and Sean were great! They are always so helpful every time I come in the office. I highly recommend!!

name: Blank Man
text: Great place to store your belongings. The staff is very friendly. I can't remember the name guy that is there majority of the time. Regardless this place is where you want to store your stuff and most importantly it's affordable.

name: Jessica Cunningham
text: Convenient location. Friendly staff. But they keep raising the rates and did nothing to get rid of the mice in my unit.  I had to personally get them out. Insurance didn't cover any damages and I am still having to enter my unit with caution because of the critters trying to move back in.

name: Amy Mansell
text: I can’t say enough about this facility. These guys are awesome! Year after year they donate a unit to the Tent City Project in efforts to help our city’s homeless community. Joel and his staff are simply amazing. If I could get them 10 stars, I would! I recommend over any other!

name: Latoya Herring
text: I was looking for the best prices that were near where my grandmother lives( the storage is for her), and decided to try this place. John went above and beyond for me. He showed me a space and gave me prices on said spaces, told me everything up front so that way there were no surprises. For that i will always be grateful thanks John for taking the time out for me and my questions.

name: John White RCDD
text: Great place. Great service. Clean units. Cameras and fence. Plenty of room. Average prices.

name: Chase Downing
text: Aislinn had a great attitude and was extremely helpful. I would highly recommend to friends or family.

name: Carolyn Hastings
text:
I moved to Alabama recently, and I rented a storage locker from LifeStorage on rte 72 in Madison on the enthusiastic recommendation from a neighbor who had previous experience with them.

First, the facility has everything you might expect, and then some.  It is super clean, well lighted and well paved.  The security is excellent, with 24/day 7 days/week access to the lockers through a security coded gate. Todd and Joel are extremely helpful, and do everything they can to make the experience go as smoothly as possible. In fact, I even got a phone call from Todd last week to let me know that my lock hadn't properly engaged the locking mechanism -- so they even check to make sure that the individual lockers are secure.

I have rented storage lockers at four facilities in three different states.  I liked each of the places I dealt with, but this is definitely the best.

Highly recommended.

name: Jason Troutman
text: They were very helpful and polite!  Also a very convenient and secure system. I would definitely recommend to a friend.

name: Tanya Murray
text: After searching many self storage units co-located to my rental, I stopped in here at lunch on Monday. Todd discussed the various rental sizes and costs associated, including insurance and then took me for a tour of the facility actually opening a vacant unit to verify the size I had inquired about. I went back the following day and rented a unit. If you are looking for exceptional customer service that is what you will get from these guys. Very helpful, units were clean and prices are reasonable. Glad I stopped.

name: Brad French
text: Nice lady, decent prices. Would recommend

name: Joe Velasquez
text: I was very impressed with the way Joel handled my inquiry.  Joel made sure I understood all aspects of renting a storage area.  He provided a tour of the facility including both external and climate controlled storage areas.  I rented my storage from Joel who is by far the best storage manager I have met.

name: Diana Tuten
text: Mr. Brian was extremely helpful and professional for my entire time I had my household goods in storage (4.5 years).  The facility was so clean and safe, which means a lot to me.  I felt so welcomed every time I stepped into the office--which was great! If I ever need a storage unit again I will most definitely put my goods in the units at this location!! 😉👍

name: FOR Rescue
text: As a not for profit, volunteer run animal rescue group, we often times have to rely on the generosity of area businesses. This facility helped us immensely during a recent shoe drive that we participated in. We couldn’t have done it without them. They were wonderful.

name: Dale Carter
text: Staff are courteous, professional, and helpful. Facilities are clean, well lit, and well maintained. Associated products are available at reasonable cost. Offers easy access to online maintenance of personal accounts.  Involves only a 5 calender day grace period before late payment fees apply. A reasonable extension to this grace period for established long term customers would personally gain a 6th star in future reviews:)

name: ac lopez
text: First time using storage facility, location was great and maintained very well. Joel provided an excellent tour and answered all questions with great detail. Highly recommended!

name: Angela Jenkins
text: The guys provide excellent customer service! I like their ethics and follow through. Their prices are better than advertised, and the facilities are clean and well managed.

name: Kimberly Lamar
text: Brittany was EXTREMELY helpful and made getting my first storage unit the easiest experience. Super friendly and professional girl!

name: Tyler Brown
text: Despite being here for a short time, my experience was everything I needed and more. Ian and his staff were more than accommodating to my needs, and worked with me until my wife and I were ready to move into our new home. Rates are reasonable, and the facilities are clean and well lit. I would recommend these facilities to anyone looking for a quick solution or a long-term.

name: Rj Robinson
text: Joel and his staff are amazing! I highly recommend this facility because they are courteous and will make sure your trusted items are secure! They treat their customers with the utmost respect! Great job!

name: Sharonda Russell
text: Joel was the best. I was traveling from Nashville and he stayed after hours for me to make it in. They were so helpful and so nice. Thanks again!

name: Early Man
text: Great customer service. Clean property. Would highly recommend.

name: Ben Grady
text: Went in to inquire about prices as I have just recently moved to the area, the manager was helping another lady when I came in but was very polite and professional

name: Sherelle Gilbert
text: I had a great experience with Life Storage. The prices were very reasonable and the staff was awesome! I would recommend them for your storage needs in this area!

name: Lisa Scott
text: Great service, decent prices. Would recommend.

name: Beth Pearson
text: Service is always great! Would definitely recommend.

name: Kelli Conerly
text: Great experience! Joel took great care of me and really cares about the customer! I would definitely recommend this to anyone

name: John Wood
text: This is a great place to get storage, the facilities are clean and well kept, the staff are awesome and always there to help when needed.  They even went out of their way to check our motorhome after a wind storm so I didn't have to run down and look.  I'd recommend this place to anyone wanting storage space.

name: B Royer
text:
Brittany Higdon is the best manager to serve store #351 in 5 years! Having personal experience with the operations of this company, she has the potential to be a top performer. Having rented here off and on for more than a decade, she has raised the standards back to what they were in 2012. Keep up the good work and tweak the small things.
To customers, this is the best facility to rent from if you want peace of mind that your things are safe and will be cared for, rent at this location.  Life Storage, formerly Uncle Bob's is a wonderful company to work for and they care about their customer base! Shout out to Williamsville!

name: Nick Denny
text: Let me begin with the positive: lots of room to enter the lot and maneuver.  That's where the good ends...  There are significant gaps in important information given online as well as from the employees.   You must bring a paper copy of insurance, it seems easy and somewhat a reasonable request, but they don't tell you till you arrive to sign...you have to either leave to print it or call your insurance company to fax it.  Also there is no agreed truck usage at this location, in fact there is no truck, there is a van at another location and its not free, you have to pay $20 for the commercial insurance...though the employee told me my personal vehicle insurance would work...paper copy.  Lastly, the size of the unit is 'nominal' meaning they are rounding UP to 10'x10' from the actual 9'x9.5'.  If I hadn't already gone through the hassle of signing and paying for the unit already, I would go somewhere else...

name: B B
text: The employees and staff of Life Storage are wonderful in helping their local community like thru The Tent City Project.  Any company who is willing to help and benefit their communities is a business I would want to associate with and do business with. Thank you!

name: D Lifeform
text: Shopping around for almost anything these days is often exhausting, frustrating, and disappointing. Therefore, it was a most pleasant surprise to find that customer service is indeed alive and well at the LifeStorage store #351 on Highway 72 West, in Madison, AL.  I would like to sincerely thank Joel Sherman, Store Manager, and Brittany, for their professionalism, as well as their kindness.  The fabulous customer service I received absolutely tipped the scales in favor of my renting a storage unit here, rather than at a competitor's store.  I was also extremely impressed with how immaculate the facility is, both inside and out.  I am quite pleased with the entire experience I had here and look forward to my future dealings with Joel and Brittany.  Thank you!

name: Donna Morris
text: Would definitely recommend this place, Sean and Brittany were so helpful!

name: Timothy Boyd
text: Went in to buy some boxes & Brittany gave great customer service! Definitely coming again.

text: I used their storage for two years,never missing a payment! In May I began a new move and couldn't get all my storage that day! I decided to let the property go at a loss but yet they keep billing me for the property that I could not come back and Get! I should not have to pay billing and release my property to them at the same time! Todd is very argumentative, but  Joel values Customer service!

THANK YOU JOEL.

She is always there and even moves her lunch around to accommodate her customers’ needs.  When I needed a bigger unit, she helped me find the right size. I live in a different city now, but I won’t move from here because the customer service is so great!  ~Wendy

text: Rita went above and beyond with her excellent customer service and friendly demeanor. We were impressed with how nice the facility is, air conditioning works well. We are happy we chose GS Public Storage.

text: I have had at least one storage unit here for many years sometimes as many as 3 units. Rita has always been great to work with and has always been very helpful with any assistance I ever needed. The facility is always safe, clean and well maintained. I look forward to many more years of worry free services Rita provides here at Public Storage.

text: My experience at Public Storage in Gulf Shores was as good as it gets. Rita took great care of me and made sure I had everything I needed to get my storage bin set up. I highly recommend this facility 👍

text: We rented a unit at this Gulf Shores location today. Rita Ann was so helpful! The property is very clean, the unit we rented was spotless and the entire building is obviously well maintained. I would not hesitate to recommend this business.

name: Anne Laplante
text: Pay no attention to the office hours listed in maps if you need to buy boxes - half the time there is a sign on the door that the office is closed. Recommend calling first and if you never get to a person who confirms they are open, don’t go!

name: Michael Manker
text: I was in a bind and needed a small unit. Ann was absolutely fantastic and found the perfect storage unit for me. She even helped by walking me to the unit, finding a cart to help load my stuff, and walked my through the entire process. 10/10 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: Leigh Ann Humphryes
text: Excellent service. Rita was knowledgeable and helped me to pick the right size unit for my needs. I dreaded having to move some things but she made it as pleasant as possible. Would recommend.

name: Stacy Green
text: If it wasn't for Rita, I would have never realized that the unit size I reserved online was NEVER going to be big enough to store all of my stff. She was so incredibly helpful every step of the way! Rita is a real gem.

name: Denise Lynn Gueltzow
text: Rita and Ann are very professional, willing to help, and make you feel very comfortable with your decision to use their storage facility. I would definitely recommend the Gulf Shores location.

name: Susie Pappas
text: Rita called me when I had accidentally left my unit unlocked. I have had a couple of opportunities to talk and work with Rita and I am always impressed with her kindness and professionalism. She makes the experience enjoyable.

name: Briant D
text:
From the first contact with Rita at Public storage to the final locking of  our 10x20 storage was SO easy! THANK YOU Rita.
Rita stayed in constant contact with us and took the time to understand our needs. She worked with her manager and they strategized a plan that took the worry out of our arrival and our storage needs.
Rita and Public storage are highly recommended by us. Extremely clean, practicing good health policies and great customer care.

name: Nikki Hahn
text: Ms Ann was awesome she's a pleasure to work with and was very kind and helpful. We have not only one but two units here

name: Megan Wallace
text: I have a time share and needed some helpful information on storage units in the area. I really appreciate Ann’s help and hospitality! She also provided me with additional information about the Gulf Shores area. I definitely recommend public storage! Thanks for your help Ann!!!

name: Leigh Ann C
text: We were looking for a smaller unit to store some stuff for the summer between a move. Rita was so kind and helpful to get us the right space for our needs. Having to move is such a hassle but she made this process so smooth & easy. If I have to store again in the area I will come back here for sure.

text: This public storage office is amazing, the great customer service they provide is something i’ve never seen from other places. Thank you so much for your help!

Will be referring to family and friends!:)

text: Rita assisted me. Very personable and professional in setting up service. Also, very pleased with the Covid 19 precautions and practiced. Made me feel like they care about my and their staff's health.

name: Selena Robinson
text: mrs rita was a doll helping me get things all set up I really recommend this property

name: Stephen C
text: Very good customer service. Rita went over and beyond. A+ in my book.

name: Ron Gudgel
text:
My price increased significantly on two different spaces ($142 to $162 or 21.1% in 2018, $85 to $102 or 25.9% in 2019, $102 to $127 or 24.5% 2020); the climate control was turned up in the summer that increased humidity; and automatic light fixtures timed to go off too soon with some not fixed in over two years.  Ann was staff person who scolded me and then told me I was arguing when addressing her comments - she had been ok up until this occurred on the weekend of 7/25-26.........

(My comments were not succinct so hope this clarifies my review to indicate who & what upset me so you can take appropriate action.
Corporate policy price increases & low maintenance budget are the issues not this location per se, including Rita who's always been friendly & considerate or the personnel form Mobile who helped with the changeover to your company or the district manager - he even took time to fix my door a couple years ago...)

name: michael cameron
text:
On January 11, 2020, Rita and Ann did an outstanding job showing us a larger unit, answering our multiple questions and dealing with complications due to us sharing the unit with two other couples.
Both were very friendly, informative and accommodating.
Great job!!!
Michael  & Shirley Cameron

name: Kristy Burgess
text: I would highly recommend Public Storage in Gulf Shores.  Ann was very helpful and explained everything very well. She took her time explaining the process and showing the units.

name: hatsbyanne1942
text: We highly recommend this super clean storage facility.  The staff is so friendly and accommodating.  A great place to store your valuables. Rita was so helpful in helping me find my unit and then making sure that I knew how the lock worked.  Thank you, Rita.

name: Maegan Torres
text: Rita and Ann were just so incredibly nice with helping me get setup. The process was quick and to the point. Ann walked me through everything, showed me the unit. We even bonded over being far from home. Definitely will enjoy my time here!

name: Houston C
text: I was in and out very quickly thanks to Rita! Super clean establishment, and it was very easy to find.

name: Sarah Latham
text: Best customer service ever!! Ann was great!!

name: Laura Humphrey
text: Mrs.Rita was very helpful with giving me the information that I was searching for. She was very friendly and sweet.

name: James Cooper
text: See Ann the curator of Public Storage. professional knowledgeable, and very helpful.

name: Amy Merrell
text: Very clean and easily accessible. Ann and Rita are very kind and helpful. Ann even jumped my car off for me when my battery died in the parking lot! I highly recommend them.

name: Chalmer Detling
text: Very nice and clean facility.  Rita was very knowledgeable and made the lengthy process fairly simple.  It is also very close so made it more appealing.  I would recommend!

name: Ashlie Harris
text: As soon as I reserved my unit online Ann gave me a phone call with more details and answered all of my questions! Rita gave me tour of my unit and helped me out with all of my paperwork and any other questions! Very reasonable pricing and so clean! I feel so comfortable storing my items here!

name: Dave Fountain
text: Very friendly, helpful and highly knowledgeable. The cleanest storage facility I've ever seen. Please save yourself time and call or stop in Public Storage in Gulf Shores right before the bridge in front of the airport.

name: Janie Williams
text: Thank you, Ann!!!! We Seniors need all the great help we can get,and you were that great help!!!!

name: Ronald Martin
text: Had occasion to work with  Ann and Rita to obtain a storage unit. Both were knowledgeable, courteous, helpful and a pleasure to do business with. The complex and individual units were clean and easily accessible. this is about the 5th time we have used storage units and by far the best experience!!!

name: Morgan Tidmore
text: Had a great experience. Rita was so sweet and  helpful. There wasn’t a question she didn’t know. Will definitely use again if needed

name: Jyl Cannon
text: Rita was amazing! She is so friendly and helpful! She made the process seamless, easy and quickly!

name: James Popejoy
text:
Ms.Ann has exceptional Customer Service ..knowledgeable ..clean facility ..definitely a good experience during a hectic move ..thank you. And just im amazed at how good she is at what she does and the person she is simply amazing.
WOW...

name: Jenny
text: Bait and switch. Cost to move in was SUPPOSED to be $25! I got there and was REQUIRED to buy a $20 lock from them. That got me to $45. Then they start rent at the first of the month...needless to say, I ended up paying TWICE the rate for 3 weeks worth of use. Holding my breath that my stuff isn’t stolen, because their lock can be picked by an expert they have on staff, so much for SECURE STORAGE!

name: Cynthia Jordan
text: The nicest and most qualified representative (Rita). Very clean and well run!

name: Lisa Gunter
text: Wonderful experience.  Ms. Rita was so kind and knowledgeable.  The facility was very clean and well maintained.

name: Wanda Ruth
text: Stopped in and picked up a few items from Ms. Debbie today. She was very polite and a pleasure to deal with.  Very knowledgeable about the products she sells. Will definitely be back if I’m ever in need of more boxes!!!

name: Jane Nelson
text: Came in to buy some packing products a few days ago and Lexi was the sweetest thing, she helped me get the right size packing paper and she mentioned that if I didn't need the box I was hesitant about buying she would be able to give me a refund if it was unused. She had such a great personality that I chose to come back today to pick up more paper and get some measurements on different sized boxes. Overall great experience and thank you for your knowledge and helpful advice! Will come again!

name: Charles Greer
text:
Facilities are nice, and onsite office staff are great!  HOWEVER...
BEWARE corporate "bait and switch" rates!  After six months, my online "deal" rate for my unit jumped from $89.00 to $104.00, an almost 17% increase.  Will the rate be $121.00 six months from now????

name: JULIE GREEN
text: Rita and Ann are very nice however the problem is the corporate office doesn’t care about people and situations!!  Evidently the people that moved out the bedroom furniture in the storage building left one thing and  for that Jennifer at the corporate office wants me to pay another $140 whatever..  they prorate only when you move in not when you move out!

name: Jessica Knight
text: Great customer service!! Will recommend highly!! Thank you to the lady  up front that worked with me!!

name: Don Carson
text: I moved here from Hernando Mississippi and needed two storage units . Rita was such a tremendous help in making that happen for me and so friendly when I got here. Just can't say enough about Rita going the extra mile.

name: April Barnett
text: Rita was very helpful and professional from beginning until the end. She answered every question and was able to get us what we needed to store our belongings.

name: Sue Schuler
text: I had to go into the office today to sign my new lease. The ladies that work in the office are just the sweetest things. The facility looks really nice with all the things that have been done. If you need storage I recommend the Gulf Shores location.

name: Joey Pease
text:
Great location and very  descent storage facility.The lady Ann was always very helpful and kind, unlike the last place i stored at.
That matters when you're irritated from moving stuff lol

name: John Pace
text: Rita was extremely helpful and made the process of renting a storage unit seamless and smooth.

name: Ron Eubank
text: Kudos to Rita at Gulf Shores! She helped me through an upgrade to a larger unit without any problems. I was already a satisfied customer, but every transaction counts and Rita shows that PS knows it.

name: SS S
text: The lady in the office was very helpful even with all my questions. I am giving the service I was given 5 stars. I made my reservation with the call center and was told what I would have to pay. I was NOT told I would have to purchase a lock and insurance. So I called my agent and everything was cleared up. The lock is a little hard to use but I feel like the security it offers is worth the price I paid.

name: Geremie Fresh
text: Mrs. Rita was wonderful. Thank you so much for all your help. I would highly recommend this location to anyone.

name: Lloyd Moore
text:
The folks that work their are great.  The facility is well maintained and clean.  They get two stars because of what I consider shady business practices by "Corporate".

I was just notified that the monthly storage rate was going up by 20%.  After some calls it seems like their units are staying full and there are "no special rates anymore".  We never knew we had a special rate.  It was the standard rate.

What they are doing is jacking up the rates in hopes folks will leave and they can get more for the units.  A 20% jump is a big increase for no reason at all.

name: Coralie Anne Farish Scott
text: Rented this morning. Rita was super nice & very informative. She made renting a unit here very easy. The unit itself is climate controlled and a code is required to get in the building and on the elevator which makes me feel safe about storing my belongings here.

name: Sherie Box
text: Great experience! Rita was courteous, helpful and friendly. She goes out of her way to make you feel welcome and informed!

name: Deborah Watts
text: Rita is wonderful to work with.

name: Colby Williams
text: Nice friendly fast showed us the difference sizes by taking us to different units and letting us look inside to see if it would fit everything we had to store got us in today.

name: Paige moore
text: This store has the BEST customer service! Ann is always so helpful. I feel so confident leaving everyone. Thank you, Ann and Public Storage!

name: Sarah Hadley
text: My experience with  Ann was awesome she's so helpful and friendly and answered all my questions and took care of everything in a timely manner and the storages are so clean and well kept. If you need a storage unit go see Ann in Gulf Shores she will always greet you with a smiling face.

name: Charles McCleese
text: This is my second visit here to see a unit. Linda made me feel comfortable during the rental process. She answered all of my questions with confidence and made me feel at ease. Thank you so much for everything you did to make this as easy as possible.

name: Jessica Parizo
text:
Mrs. Rita is amazing.

She goes above and beyond to help in anyway she can. You won’t need to worry about a thing when working with her. The facility was clean and well kept as well.

name: Ryan Patrick
text: I was truly impressed with how clean and nice the facility is. The young lady in the office was very patient with us as we decided if we wanted the unit or not. She was kind and sweet. Would recommend to my friends. Thank you.

name: J.D D
text: I want to say just how wonderful Rita and Linda are. I had a lot of trouble getting to Al but they made sure I had units when I got here. I am thankful for that. I am giving 5 stars to them. I wasn't happy about the insurance requirement or the lock purchase. However that wasn't their fault and they made it a smooth transaction.

name: Linda Oakes
text: The gals that are in the local office are outstanding, especially Ann.  The facility is very clean and well maintained.  My only complaint has to do with their price increases for no apparent reason.    We have had 3 price rate increases in 1.5 years, going from $130 to $150 to $182 ... I  believe their units are staying full, jacking up the rates in hopes folks will leave and they can rent at higher pricing.  We have been inconvenienced a few times, when they re-did the blacktop, we could not pull anywhere close to units, having to walk & carry, they closed a couple times with no email notice causing us to drive an hour only to find them closed!  I was more inline thinking we should get a credit for inconvenience.  We will be checking other locations/ as there are several new going up in the area but only because of price.  Give us a fair price break, for being a good customer and we stay.

name: Susie Collova
text: Rita was very pleasant, helpful and knowledgeable about her facility! Definitely would recommend this storage facility to my friends.

name: joey pease
text:
Thank you for great & fast service Ann.
I know my storage is in good hands!
Thank you

name: Brenda Perry
text: Terrific experience! Rita was able to work her magic and find space. Highly recommend!

name: Wendy Collins
text: I love this place, I felt like all of my belongings were safe and secure. TheTstaff was amazing! The  only thing that really upset me was when I told them I was moving out. It just so happened that I couldnt move in to my apartment until the 1st. So I went in to the office and they told me I would be charged for a whole month if I'm not out before the 1st,! I can't believe that they prorate if you move in in the middle of the month or whatever but if you move out they don't prorate even if it's only for one day you have to pay a whole month so I had to rent a U-Haul truck unload all of my stuff into a truck let it sit overnight and take it to my place to next day just so I wouldn't get charged for a whole month I think that's ridiculous!

text: I paid up 2 months the on my storage unit and I moved out in a week.. They said they would refund me all the money I paid up to, okay!! I could use that to make my phone payment.. I waited 3 weeks for a 5 dollar check in the mail because that's how they refund money.. I will never ever in my life purchase a storage unit with Public Storage at any location.. I would advice going elsewhere Bec Public Storage will steal your money and way over charge you and do not pay up on the unit and move out they will keep your money..

name: Lilliya Michelle Finwall
text: I like this business. Owner Mike Rich is a really great guy! Everyone there is very nice and professional. The shop is always buzzing and the tow trucks roll in and out all day and night. This is a hardworking bunch. You can't go wrong calling Mike Rich and "Rich's Collision and Towing".

text: I witnessed a man with a woman in the passenger seat go down our road twice and speeding like crazy. I am very upset about it because I have kids on this road and so do other families. text: The employees are really friendly and helpful. The storage facility is very clean (inside and outside)..They're conveniently opened 24 hours a day,.. The security is greay, including gates and lots of security cameras.. And the price is affordable as well :)  I would highly recommend this business to others who need storage.

name: toters911
text: Great place, owner's daughter seems cool

name: Martin Smith
text: I use to keep my things at SmithStoreit on Hwy 72, but once they sold out to Storage Sense, I moved my things to Ryland Mini Storage, Kelly knows her stuff and was super helpful from one manager to another, Kelly is the best, plus the brand new climate building is nice and clean, just how I like it! Keep up the hard work Kelly!

name: Karen Nabors
text:
If you are in business, it's not if a problem is going to occur it is when.  It is how a company recovers that speaks volumes to their customer service. Last week we had a really disappointing experience with an employee at Ryland Mini. After being denied access to a manager, I sent a message via Ryland Mini's FB Messenger page explaining our situation. The manager, Kelly, responded back very quickly.  She was on vacation, however she took the time out to call and speak with us directly. Kelly was very gracious, assured us the situation would be resolved and was very apologetic.  Kelly has always taken excellent care of us and continues to impress.
Ryland Mimi Storage is a business I can recommend with confidence. The units are extremely clean, pricing is very competitive and management is exceptional!

resp.text: Hi Karen, We are so sorry that you had a bad experience with our location. We have a high standard of  quality customer service for our tenants.  Our manager will be contacting you to make this right.

name: Mary Hartley
text: Great people and great faculty to keep you things safe and secure.

text: Great staff and good prices!

text: Terrible management
