We would appreciate the opportunity to learn how we could make this a 5-star experience. Would you kindly share more specific details of your visit via email to info@pankeyproperties.com so that we may discuss improvements with our team?

Thank you, and we hope to hear from you soon.

name: Braeden Censored
text: Awesome!

name: David P
text: Good

name: MK ULTRAVIOLENCE
text: This place is literally AMAZING! The management is so friendly and answered all of my questions without hesitation. The rates are UNBELIEVABLY affordable. The lowest in town; Combined with the exceptional customer service this place gets 5 stars!

resp.text: Your kind words did not go unnoticed, MK. We greatly appreciate your support. Being around for so long allows us to offer such competitive rates and we love taking care of our customers. Thank you. - Kiera

name: Capriee Tucker
text: Very personable and knowledgeable staff. Never hesitated to answer any of my questions. Grounds are neat amd I always feel safe. My mother has used them for 2 years and I knew immediately who to rent from.

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us with your storage needs, Capriee. Cleanliness and security are very important to us. If you have any more questions for us, don't hesitate to call. We'd be happy to help. Thank you for your support. - Kiera

name: Tim Countess
text: This place is perfect for all my storage needs.  I have one unit that is climate controlled and protects my important items that are sensitive to heat/cold and humidity.  I feel my items are very well protected and the area is nice and secured.  Then my needs changed and had more items to store and the very friendly office staff was able to find me an outside unit in very short time.  I'm using that for shop and tool storage that can be outside.  The rates for both climate controlled and other storage are the most competitive anywhere around.  I also like the easy access location in Madison, along the BLVD and on a low traffic side street that makes entry and exit with my trailer and truck very stress-free.  Also there is plenty of room in both areas for your truck and trailer access to make loading and unloading a breeze.  This is the 3rd time over the past 7 years I've used this location and HIGHLY recommend checking them out for any needs you have.

resp.text: We greatly appreciate your continued support over the years, Tim. We are happy to help our customers as their needs change and our competitive pricing makes it all even better. Thanks for the recommendation! - Kiera

name: A J
text:
Friendly staff both times I've used them  worked out fine.
The unit was the right size everything fit in fine no problem, but the slide lock & the rollup door was messed up when opening and closing needs some maintenance. Will recommend this storage to friends.

resp.text: Thanks for bringing this to our attention, AJ. We will have someone take a look at it as soon as we can. We want our customers to know their items are safe and secure with us here at U-Lock-It Storage. We thank you for your business and support! - Kiera

name: Savannah Rae
text: I've been very impressed with my personal experience. The staff is very friendly and caring.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Savannah! Happy holidays! - Kristine

name: Antonio Roberts
text: I have always supported family owned businesses, and ever since choosing ULock It Storage over 3 years ago.  They are always smiling and greeting everyone as they walk in to either rent a unit or make a payment.  Treat everyone like family, and always has great prices on storage units. Will highly recommend to others looking to rent storage units from a great company A+++++

resp.text: Thanks for supporting our family-owned business, Antonio. Being locally and family owned is how we can offer such competitive pricing. We greatly appreciate your continued support. Thanks for being part of the family! - Kiera

name: Jonathan Bishop
text: Friendly staff and competitive pricing!  I would highly recommend U-Lock-It Storage for your excess storage.

resp.text: We try to keep very competitive pricing, Jonathan. We thank you for leaving a review and for your support. - Kiera

name: BRANDY HOLT
text: I am very pleased with U-Lock-It Storage in all aspects. I have had several different storage units over the years and U-Lock-It has been the best hands down. The staff is friendly and helpful all the time, the facility is well kept and maintained, and the lighting inside and outside of my unit is great. The day I went in to see about renting my units, Christy took the time to sit with me and help me figure out just how much space I needed. Yes, most places do that, however, Christy didn't just try and throw specials at me, or get me to spend more money just to have extra space. She did however, get me the best deal for what I needed, then threw in the appropriate discounts! This particular U-Lock-It Storage location is the best! I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a place to store their things!

resp.text: We are absolutely thrilled to hear your experience with us was so wonderful, Brandy. Security and lighting is very important to us and is something we take very seriously, too. We will definitely pass along this message to management. We appreciate your business and taking the time to leave us a 5-star review. Let us know if we can be of more service to you! - Kiera A.

name: Betty Stevenson
text: Christy has  always been available to help in any way that she can. Thank you for your thoughtfulness and going the extra mile to help us when we got locked out and today when I needed the support. God Bless You!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words Betty! We passed this along to Christy as well and it made her day. Sorry about the delayed reply. -Justin

name: Fred Fletcher
text:
Christy Golden, Property Manager at U-Lock-It, genuinely wants to help people. I recently moved my step-daughter down and we were looking for a storage facility. There were some items that we were unsure about storing and Christy gave us her honest and professional opinion regarding the storage of the items, which saved us thousands of dollars; if we had stored them like we planned.  In addition, because of the move, are budget was a little over, so Christy took the time out of her schedule to give us some additional local numbers to check other prices; however, after calling around and comparing the prices,  U-Lock-it had the best prices. Most important, Christy’s customer service, her positive attitude and willingness to assist us on the day before the 4th of July showed that her Family Owned Company was the best for us.
When you’re moving you can be at a vulnerable stage and I have seen some companies take advantage of that; however, Christy at U-Lock-It demonstrated that she cared and treated me and  my step-daughter with nothing but the upmost respect. She actually treated us like family.
I whole-heartedly endorse U-Lock-It for any of your storage needs.
Excellent company
Fred

resp.text:
Hello Mickey, we are sorry to hear about your experience while renting with us. While we do occassionally increase our rates, this is done to provide a better experience to our customers by way of improvements made to facilities and covering increases to maintenance costs. We always take great care when raising rates to ensure that they happen as infrequently as possible, and with impact as dictated by the market. Even with that, we always try to provide the smallest possible increase. If there is anything we can do to assist you further, please reach us at feedback@istorage.com.

Sincerely,
The iStorage Decatur - Deere Rd Team

name: David Glaze
text: Just moved to Alabama and needed to store my belongs. Istorage was great, had the right storage unit for my needs. The manager; Rita, she was great. Thanks for making me feel like I was coming home.

name: Ali Franks
text: If this storage building wasn’t the only one near by I would have rented somewhere else. The manager is rude and yelled at my movers whenever they were dropping my belongings off at my unit. There were items left over from the last tenant that the manager said she was going to get out and never did. They also rented the unit I had reserved online without even calling me about it. They are expensive for what you get. Also be aware that the price of your unit is not a fixed rate like they tell you and it is subject to change (not disclosed whenever you start renting). They also tell you they prorate a month if you were moving out, what they don't tell you is that they only prorate if you are out by the 5th of the month.

resp.text: Hi Ali, the staff at iStorage Priceville take our reviews very seriously and we appreciate you taking the time to share your concerns with us. It is thanks to feedback like yours that we can tackle issues that may impact our most valuable asset; our customers. I have sent your comments to the management at iStorage Priceville for review. We look forward to serving you in the future. If there is anything more we can do to improve your experience please email us at info@istorage.com or give us a call toll-free at 844-311-2342. Best Regards, the iStorage Team.

name: Lilly P
text: AWESOME EXPERIENCE. SAFE SECURE LOCATION. Five Star customer service! I had to put my things in storage for a bit, moving from one state to another. Basically my entire life was in that storage unit, and it’s hard to TRUST that all your things are going to be ok. Naturally I think of every worst case scenario, flooding, theft, mice. I chose this facility because it is gated, well lit, secure, and the website says the manager lives on site. I paid extra for the air-conditioned unit, and it was very easy to load my things into. When I moved my things out 2 weeks early… I got a phone call from Christy. Asking if I was permanently moved out… That thoroughly impressed me for a variety of reasons. A) they proactively reached out to me to ensure my stuff was OK & to make sure I was ok with turning auto-pay off. How many companies would just bill you for another month and hope you forgot to cancel? Also, when I asked how she knew I moved out the night before, they said they walk the grounds every morning and inspect every unit to make sure there wasn’t damage. If I ever need a storage unit again in the future, I will absolutely use this place. That gave me such a great feeling that my things are secure, and to know they’re inspecting every single unit every day. That’s awesome. You can definitely trust this place with your stuff!

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, Lilly. We know that your items are important to you, so we make it a priority to provide a safe and secure self-storage experience. It’s important to us that you feel appreciated as our customer; we are here to help at 888-STORAGE if anything comes up.

name: Christin French
text: AWESOME EXPERIENCE. FRIENDLY CUSTOMER SERVICE. I rarely take the time to write reviews but I had to share my experience! I had to put my things in storage for a bit, moving from one state to another. Basically my entire life was in that storage unit, and it’s hard to TRUST that all your things are going to be ok. Naturally I think of every worst case scenario, flooding, theft, mice. I chose this facility because it is gated, well lit, secure, and the website says the manager lives on site. I paid extra for the air-conditioned unit, and it was very easily accessible and easy to load my things into. When I moved my things out 2 weeks early… I got a phone call from Christy. Asking if I was permanently moved out… That thoroughly impressed me for a variety of reasons. A) they proactively reached out to me to ensure my stuff was OK & to make sure I was ok with turning auto-pay off. How many companies would just bill you for another month and hope you forgot to notify them? Also, when I asked how she knew if I moved out, they said they walk the grounds every morning and inspect every unit to make sure there wasn’t damage. If I ever need a storage unit again in the future, I will absolutely use this place. That gave me such a great feeling that my things are secure, and to know they’re inspecting every single unit every day. That’s awesome. You can definitely trust this place with your stuff!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Christin. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. Extra Space Storage takes great pride in protecting your belongings and strives to provide state-of-the-art security, we're thrilled that your experience has reflected that. Stop by our office or give us a call at 888-STORAGE at any time if you need assistance or have any questions.

name: Kyle E
text: This morning I was looking for a place to store unnessisary items that I do not need or use at all. While I am a college student I wanted a place to store my items to make my appartment a happy livable space. Today I went to store 8477 and met a very lovely associate named April Goodman and while  I was there she treated me not only as a customer, but it welt like during the our time felt like family. When I asked to see the 5' by 7' we looked at the unit and it was not something i was looking for. However when she suggested a 5' by 15' we needed to walk to the very far building on the property to view the unit. Ms. April recommended the golf cart. I told her we did not need to use it since it is a beautiful day out and it would be a nice walk to get exercise. As walking down I told her I might not like the 15' size and asked about the 5' by 8' and that it was the last one available and that we needed to walk back to the main building to see it. As we were walking to the last building she asked if I still wanted to see the 15 footer and I asked her please. When we walked back to the 5 by 8 room I walked in it and i felt in love with the space that it had its own light and also own air vent. I told her it was sold and we went back to the office and did all the paper work and I am now renting a air controlled 5' by 8' and so far I love it. As I was loading my unit an hour ago I loaded a car load in the unit then walked to the office to ask a question. As I opened the door to the office I was looking into the office smiling and as I was walking in Ms. April's office phone rang and Ms. Lechelle in the desk right next to her asked me how can i help you. As I was walking in I did not notice Ms. Lechelle asking me that question. So as I continued walking into the office Ms. Lechelle rudely asked me how may I help you. I asked my question and left the office not happy with the tone she was talking to me in as a paying customer. I do not appresiate that at all. Next time I go to the office to get help I will only make sure that I only ask miss april for help no matter if there are 2 people in the office or if she is off I will only work with her. Overall I love the facility and I would gladly recommend it to my friends and family if they ever need any storage rooms. But because of the rude experience I will only rate this 4 stars!!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Hi Kyle, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We aim to provide the highest level of customer service and are thrilled to hear your experience with April reflects that! We're delighted to hear you are so happy with the storage unit you rented! Providing a positive experience for each of our customers is very important to us and we hope to better serve you next time you visit the office. Your recommendation means a lot to us. Thank you again for leaving us a review! Don't hesitate to give us a call at (256) 461-0235 or stop by our office if you need anything in the future!

text: Pulled into the parking lot with my service dog, that was feeling sick. He was about throw up.  I pulled to the end of the building and let my dog out, so he might puke or release diarrhea to feel better, and this lady comes out screaming at me to get off her property.  I explained the situation and she called the police.  I explained that he's a service dog, showed her the Service dog ID and dog tag,  and she said she didn't care.  Took photos of my license plate and everything.  I am now waiting for the police to arrive, because I didn't do anything wrong.  Nice people...

name: Glenn Riggs
text: Blackbox self storage is an amazing facility. Great management, works with you to take care of your needs. Renting and move in are simple because Jesse does whatever it takes to accommodate your move in or out. The facility is clean and well lit. The security both video and individually alarmed units allow you peace of mind.  24 hour access as well as many great occupants make it an awesome experience. It’s the only storage I’ve ever used that has a light switch rather than a timer, also has an outlet in the unit and access to water nearby. I just can’t say enough about this business. They treat you as friends and help in any way possible. I’ll certainly use them again if needed and tell everyone about them. Thanks so much Jesse.

name: Lauren Hardison
text: We rented a climate controlled unit for right at a year after we sold our house. The owner is super friendly, but the security and cleanliness is what won me over!! The automatic security that each unit has with the main gait relieved my fears of anyone breaking into our unit. It’s very well lit, so anytime I needed to go in the evenings I had absolutely no worries! Would certainly recommend this for all your storage needs!!

name: Kelli Malace
text: We originally chose Black Box Storage for the location and security. We found that the owners were wonderful to work with as well! We will definitely use them again in the future for our storage needs.

name: Blake Hogan
text: Black Box storage in Tanner is simply the best around! Very secure with cameras everywhere and great lighting. You don’t have to sign up for months and months at a time. I will definitely go back to Black Box in the future.

name: Mark Clemens
text: I was very pleased with my experience. The management was very nice, respectful, communicated well and was willing to work with me when the moving van showed up. The facility is kept in excellent condition. The security is also excellent including daily checks of each unit by the management. Automated billing is offered and works well. A worry free experience. You can tell a lot about a place during the move-in and move-out processes. This place is the best. I also learned that the humidity in the Madison Alabama area is not good for cardboard boxes. Stacked cardboard boxes began to fail over time. I do recommend the tough storage tote bins from Home Depot. They hold up well and can be stacked to the ceiling. You can seal the tote bins with Ty-wraps and large moving companies will take them without an issue. The plastic tote bins also do well if it decides to rain on moving day like it did on mine. Of course, I always recommend being a good steward of the rental space keeping it clean and reporting any issues (none for me). Although not required, I always set aside a broom and dust pan and sweep out the unit to leave it as I found it or better. Mark

resp.text: We love hearing your feedback and are thrilled to know you are enjoying your experience with us, Mark! Give us a call at (256) 837-1050 if you need any future assistance. Our team is happy to help with any of your storage needs!

name: Ted Rosseter
text:
I found this storage company while looking for a place to park my RV. I found that place just up the road and was leaving there when I noticed The Storage Neighbor lot. Since I was also looking for a place to store some things, I stopped and went in. It turned out to be one of the smarter things I have done recently!

Stephanie was on the phone helping a customer with what appeared to be a difficult situation and it took her a while to straighten things out. But that didn't bother me. I knew that if I ever had a problem, she would help me solve it. And that realization gave me a warm fuzzy feeling about having stopped there!

My unit is in a new building, bright and clean, with a smooth running, sturdy door and will be a pleasure to work with - unlike some other storage lockers I have had.

Stephanie is a hoot to work with and I have already started a list of "excuses" to stop by the office. Thank you Stephanie!

text: They do a great job at a reasonable price and relatively quick turnaround time. The location is fenced, clean, and has a professional look to it. They also provide boat trailer service. I've gone there for five years and my experience has always been positive.

name: Kevin McDaniel
text: One of the best Yamaha mechanics around. Diagnostic skills quickly found a power issue that had been bothering me for years. Repaired and serviced my F-150 in just over a day. Will definitely be going back to Allen for all future services.

name: John Doss
text: Took my motor there to get repaired,  they did figure it out, and it was complicated. I’ve had a chance to use the outboard now two seasons since the repair and they had also managed to correct an idling issue I’ve had on the motor for years that other Yamaha Mechanics told me was normal.  motor wouldn’t idle long before it would start loading up and die now with  repairs here the motor idles perfectly. The other more serious problems I had brought it in for we’re also repaired. this is the same outboard motor that another Yamaha Mechanic on 59 Summerdale told me wasn’t worth repairing and I should buy a new motor  Colonial put life back into this motor for years more use. They quickly diagnosed the problems and repaired something three other shops couldn’t.

name: Michael Howerton
text:
David is the best! Great customer service!
Me and my family were traveling home from the beach back to Atlanta when our truck broke down .
The truck was fully loaded down with the golf cart in the bed and a 32ft offshore boat attached to the back .
I told the guy who worked there ( David) that I needed a place to park everything while I came up with a plan to handle this situation. He was more than willing to allow secure parking behind the security gates .
After contacting a wrecker service and a mobile deisel mechanic I decided to attempt the repairs myself. David and I  were able to remove the top half of my engine and replace a wiring harness under the valve cover and I was back on the road within a couple of hours.
Although I have never rented a unit from this location , I can tell from the excellent customer service and extremely clean and secure facility that this is the best place to store anything! The place has strong automatic gates , camers , indoor climate control , and  large parking areas for very large campers and boats.
Thanks again David! Wish you the best !

name: Brandon West
text:
I needed to rent a Uhaul trailer to do some home improvements and this particular location had the trailer I needed. I scheduled the rental via Uhaul's website the night prior and came in during the next morning to pick up the rental. My first impression of the facility upon driving up was that it looked clean, well organized, and secure. When I walked in, I was surprised how organized and clean the office was, and was also pleased with the view of all of the cameras monitoring the storage units and the facility grounds.

As far as the rental went, everything went super smoothly. Sarah was knowledgeable, quick, efficient, and nice!  I've rented a few Uhauls in my life being prior military and this was by far the nicest and smoothest rental I've ever done. The facility impressed me enough during my visit that it'll be the first place I pick if I need to store my boat, trailer, or rent a storage unit.

Thank you Sarah!

text: Wasn't pleased about the month notice they gave me about increasing the rent fee.  Basically suggesting pay the increase or leave.  Management sucks.... In-store and District.  Called customer care line and was told either one will call me... never happened.

resp.text: Hi Nick Beadle , the staff at iStorage Laceys Spring take our reviews very seriously and we appreciate you taking the time to share your concerns with us. It is thanks to feedback like yours that we can tackle issues that may impact our most valuable asset; our customers. I have sent your comments to the management at iStorage Laceys Spring for review and you should have received a call from the District Manager to discuss your concerns. We value all our customers and work hard to keep our prices competitive and fair. Unfortunately, operating cost such as property taxes, insurance, maintenance, utilities, overhead, etc. are not stable and increase year over year.  For us to maintain excellent service levels we must pass along a portion of those increases to our customers.  In addition, unlike several of our competitors who raise rents every couple of months, we process increases annually.  We are continuing to make improvements throughout the facility including asphalt, paint and building repairs to ensure that your experience at iStorage is the best possible. We look forward to serving you in the future. If there is anything more we can do to improve your experience please email us at info@istorage.com or give us a call toll free at 844-311-2342. Best Regards, the iStorage Team.

text: Mr. Charles is freaking awesome.  I was headed to Alabama from Georgia and my back passenger tire was blown out.  He was very kind, patient and very helpful. text:
This was the worst "secure" storage facility I have ever used. The doors were propped open regularly, they
had people living in the units that were not locked and they knew it because it had been reported. Now they are rebuilding the secure units but have made no attempt to settle any disputes with the renters when the units burned to the ground. The video cameras were not working  and homeless people were living in the open  units at night when no one was around.
This place sucks.

They have made no effort to settle.

text: I had a storage unit for a few months then this unit burned completely down.  Two units down from mine, a guy & lady were living in it. I reported this numerous times with no action. This company is negligent & they proved it. My aunt had a red dot storage on schillinger rd that got broken into as well & they didn't offer anything. They told her "they didn't have cameras" . If you care about your belongings, I would NOT DARE  put your stuff in any of these facilities.

name: Peggy Adams (Pooh)
text: I would rent from them again.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your review Peggy and we appreciate your business!

name: osareafallire
text:
UPDATE: I set a calendar reminder 3 days and 1 day prior to my bill being due. On both days I checked my account balance. It was $0.00.
Six days later I received a text message advising me to pay my bill to avoid late fees. I logon the SAME day to make my payment and see that I've ALREADY been charged a late fee. In other words, they give you five days out of 30 during which to pay your bill without avoiding a late fee.

Oh, also, apparently there's a door in the back that always remains open and unlocked next to a fence that's about 3 feet high so all of their security systems either don't work when they should or do work when the shouldn't.
- the exit gate that has worked 2 weeks out of 4 months I've been there
- I've been given 4 gate codes which have been turned off without warning or notification
- There's no CERTAIN number of days during which the property manager is required to remove the lockout on your storage unit if you don't pay your bill within those 5 days. It certainly ISN'T the SAME or NEXT day which would be the case if there were an attendant. But then if there were an attendant that back door probably wouldn't remain open and unlocked.

The first night I got there I will admit the customer service agent was pretty helpful getting me into the unit since neither the gate code I was given or the building code worked for me. They were able to get me inside after a couple calls and they were nice enough so kudos for that.

I think this is the only company I've ever had to deal with that doesn't send you a bill before they send you a late charge. Red Dot conveniently reminds you of your monthly payment...the same day they charge you the late fee. I've never received an invoice or payment reminder prior to the late notice which I receive via text message and email.

I've also received text messages telling me when the gate will be closed for holidays and stuff. The message I'm getting is they want you to know when you can't get to your stuff and they want you to know once they've charged you a late fee but don't want to notify you when your bill should be paid on time. No worries, I've set a reminder of my own so sorry, you'll have to do without the extra $10 you've been accustomed to receiving.

The exit gate has been broken for almost 2 months. For a while it would still open automatically when you drove up to it but it could still be pulled or pushed open from either side. Now there's just a big chain around it. They could probably have had it repaired for the amount they've charged me in late fees but they're probably too busy slapping red pad locks on units they've yet to send out a late notice on.

name: Rebecca Eskridge
text: The facility is clean, easy to access, and the customer service via phone was wonderful! They offer a 5$ discount for auto pay which I was happy to sign up for!

They COULDNT even give us a date or time frame as to when it would be fixed. Then I just got a bill!!?? hello I NEVER left my belongings and you're going to send me a bill?? idiots!!!

I come this sunday morning to pick up the trailer and go but yet again gate wont open. Tried calling but no answer. How is it that a place like this doesnt have a 24/7 call center for stuff like this and get to working on getting this fixed when they get warnings about this kind of stuff? Very disappointing.

text: I needed a storage space and decided to try Public Storage as i have had poor to "okay" experiences with other local storage companies. Kim provided excellent customer service! Yay for me! text: I really like Kimberly. She's super friendly and so polite. See her for your storage needs.

name: Sarah Vanderford
text: I ended my lease with public storage and they continued to charge me for another month. I confirmed my lease was ended twice with a public storage employee and that I did not need to do anything else, I was payed up, and they proceeded to pass off my "bill" for another month to a debt collector. Lower management was initially helpful and confirmed that I did indeed vacate long before they said I did, and he was going to fix the issue, but then he saw it had gone to collections and there was nothing he could do with that. So he gave me the contact information for management out of Birmingham, and they never returned my calls. She answered once and the call dropped or something? And I could never get her to answer again. My fiance and I used their advertised discounts on our first two months, and ended the lease before the outrageous increase on rent the third month. We couldn't afford their regular rates. What I do know is that the company did yet again refuse to correct their mistake when I refuted the charge with the debt collector. My next step will be to pursue legal action if I can. Hopefully I do have enough proof that I did reach out and end my lease. They have hurt my credit and charged me for a space that I cancelled. Their discounts in the beginning are nice, but they will absolutely charge you for whatever they decide to. When you cancel your lease, they might simply just have "forgotten to write it down" and then refuse to fix it. I wish I could press charges. This is theft in every way.

text: From the moment I walked in to the time I left visiting this location has been wonderful! This is my first time ever getting a storage unit myself but I have been on visits to other locations and it was nothing like this one. The employees welcomed me with open arms. Tyler and Pam are amazing at customer service!! They are a pleasure to talk to and be around. I would recommend this place to anyone who needs a storage unit!! :)

name: Adam Sawyer
text:
Warning: Pricing will change!
This is not specific to the Leeman Ferry location.  But if you think you got a good deal on the price (online special), it will go away faster than you think.  I signed a contract for $69 per month.  Within 5 months, that price was increased to the standard price of $81 per month (a 17% increase).

I did receive a notice that stated 'In keeping with our high standards of location storage, it's occasionally necessary to make adjustments to our rates.'   However the advertised online pricing at the same time as my increase was even lower ($65 per month).

Public Storage makes sure you are fully moved into your storage unit, and then will take away any pricing deal!  They will not reduce the rate back to the original pricing.  You will have no choice but to pay the standard rate or move out.

text: Excellent storage experience, great customer service.  Well maintained.  Security cameras. climate controlled.  Gate access controlled.  Manager well organized. text: Called on the phone no answer and took days to return my message

resp.text:
Hey good afternoon, we apologize about the missed call and delayed response. During this pandemic our operation hours and other small management protocols have been adjusted to better suit the situation. If you're still in need of self storage or secure parking - please go online to StorageReady.com (to sign up and have access immediately) or call 334.247.9929. Thanks for your time!

text: I had never rented a storage unit before, and had SO many questions, but Courtney was absolutely amazing! She made me feel very confident not only in her abilities in her job, but also in the care and respect that she shows to tenants at Midgard. She was super friendly, a great conversationalist, and definitely set the bar for any future self-storage experiences I may have in the future. She is an absolute gem!

name: Chandler Bridges
text: Okay, let me start by saying I have moved many many times. I have also had storage units for over 25 years and in all sizes, shapes, and locations. This facility in little old Florence is by far the absolute best experience I have ever had. Not only with the storage units (clean, well lit, safe, 24 hour access), but also in that this location is a U-haul renter. I have rented 10 foot, 15 foot, and 26 foot trucks with ease multiple times from these nice folks in my two years here in Florence. Also, I have taken two 12 foot trailers and a 26 foot truck on one-way adventures. Every time the equipment is ready and the service is super fast. Alex the on-site manager is by far the nicest and most accommodating employee I have ever met at a place like this. It is always a pleasure to go in and see him. Leah, his competent co-worker, is equally as pleasant and adept at getting the job done for the customer with ease. I really can’t speak highly enough about the staff at this fantastic location. I hope if Alex ever leaves this job he would consider working for me, because I know and appreciate the value of an employee that not only cares about the customer’s business but also values the interactions with them as well. Well stocked, honest, considerate and caring sums up this Chisholm road location. They get my highest recommendation.

resp.text: Dear Most Valued Customer - the staff of Midgard Self Storage on Chisholm Road in Florence Alabama sincerely thank you for providing the highest rating for customer service, cleanliness, security and 24x7 access to your RV equipment. name: Sharon Morrison
text: I originally  gave this business  a 1 star review. My intent was to make the owner  understand the hardship he caused with what he called an honest  mistake. When I attempted  to access  my unit at 6:00 am the gate would not open. After multiple  attempts  and a messages  left on the answering machine I left. I returned  at 7:30 am hoping  that maybe the system was down and it had been corrected.  Unfortunately,  that was not the case. I once again left a message.  I waited until  8:00 am and called a 3rd time which he finally  answered. He had given us the the wrong code. The honest mistake caused a delay of 4 hours and additional expenses. I am disappointed  that the owner never apologized for his actions. I will say that the storage facility met our needs at the time and for that we are grateful.

resp.text: According to our phone records you called us around 7:00am Sunday morning and again at around 7:30.  The call was returned immediately at 8:32 when I received the message.  I am very sorry that you were inconvenienced by my honest mistake, but we are a small family owned business and do not have a call center.   I apologized at the time of my return call and then again when we spoke the next time.  I am human and am subject to making mistakes but will always try to do my best to rectify them.   Again, I'm very sorry that you were inconvenienced but it was an hour and a half, not 4 hours, and I've now apologized 3 separate times.   We are sorry for your experience and wish you the best moving forward.

name: Brandy Lockey
text: Having 24 hour access would be great especially for those who are not in the area all the time like myself. With our work schedules it's hard to make it there during your hours a lot of the times

resp.text: Thank you for the review.   We made the decision to limit access hours for safety purposes.  We aim to provide a safe secure environment for our tenants and their belongings.  It is for that reason that we limit access hours from 6am to 9pm.  We understand that can be an inconvenience for some people that would be coming in for the right reasons.  However, not everyone has good intentions late at night.   Unfortunately, the actions of a few have a negative impact for everyone else.   Sorry for any inconvenience.  Thank you again for the feedback.

name: Leigh Baker
text:
HORRIBLE experience!!!!!
My unit was broken into and several boxes and a TV were stolen!
On top of that, someone else's box of belongings was in my unit!!!
So, obviously, someone else had been broken into and the thief left what they didn't want from them in my unit!!!!!

There was no one in the office for me to turn that box in to so that the owner of the box could look for it!
There was no one to personally help me! No one local!
The person I talked to on the phone was in another State!!!

No cameras because "someone" turned them away from where they were supposed to be watching! Red Dot had NO IDEA that the cameras were turned because they did not have anyone checking them on a daily basis!
I personally turned the cameras back to how they should have been, but every time I returned, the cameras were moved again!!!

I am SO disappointed and sad at the loss of my personal and very sentimental items!!!! You have to have a code to get into the place!!!!! My belongings should have been safe and protected! That's what I paid for!!!!

name: Brandon Flynn
text: Very accomodative. Love this company and facilities. Thank You Red Dot.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Brandon, the Red Dot Storage team appreciates the kind words!

name: Keandra Lee
text:
Very very disappointed and dissatisfied. My storage constantly broken into. I walked in today to see my belongings on the top of my storage. Will be moving from here ASAP!

I DO NOT RECOMMEND MOVING YOUR BELONGINGS HERE!!!!

name: David Huneycutt
text:
Not very secure. Beware.
Edit...
Guys it wasn't so much the fact that the unit was broken into, (that was bad enough) but I had to move your security cameras 4 times after our break-in. It would be moved to not show the entrance every time. I called at least 5 times and nothing was done, I would just keep moving the camera back. Then, one day I saw a Reddot truck there and stopped him and told him the story. He promised he would contact the site manager. I never got a call. Your call center is in the Philippines. Need I say more?

resp.text: Hi David. We apologize that you have experienced a break-in. We take facility security very seriously and are always working to ensure something like this does not occur. Since you were affected by the break-in, please call us at (855) 733-3681 and choose option #5 to speak with our Coverage Specialist.

name: S Morris
text: Great rates and convenient but they need to replace the burned out lights in the facility.  It was so dark, I could not see my lock.

name: Brian Bradford
text: Ceiling lights out everywhere, was told our responsibility to change red dots light bulbs. Bathroom isn't usable at all. Ac doesn't work

resp.text: Hi Brian. We're really sorry. The bathroom onsite will never be available for customer use, as we are unable to provide constant upkeep, as is needed with public restrooms. We have made some staffing adjustments and are going to fix this! We appreciate your patience.

name: Jordan Downing
text: I paid extra for a climate controlled storage unit after moving from another state. I have called and complained TWICE because it is hotter in the storage unit than it is outside. It has been 95°+ outside and no one seems to care. I have spent thousands of dollars on my belongings in the unit and I would not have paid EXTRA for a climate controlled unit just for my belongings to get ruined due to the lack of care from the employees at Red Dot. Worst experience I have ever had with a storage facility.

text: I located this company online.  The representative I spoke did not tell me about a move-in special.  I found out about the special the first time I visited my unit from a banner hanging at the entrance.  When I called the company to inquire about the move-in special they did not want to offer it to me because I did not mention the special when I signed the rental contract.  The company did come back later and offer me the special.  I am very pleased with the facility.  It is very clean and I feel secure while I am there.

text: I have a unit with Red Dot by default once they acquired my old storage facility Eastdale Self Storage. I must admit I'm truly sad to see the old people leave not just for their friendliness and helpfulness but ever since the acquisition, my price has been steadily going up month after month with no new added benefits or explanation and I can't wait to get my things away from there. I'm honestly only doing this review to hopefully receive a $5 credit towards my bill this month until I leave but my thoughts are true and honest sadly. I hope others may be able to find a better experience than I have based off of this review. Unit #49.
